modName: Kill It With Fire Sword and Thalmor Armour
summary:
Kill it with fire is a mod witch adds a new sword and armour to the game (glass sword and thalmor armour base) both with normal and super over-powered versions
ENJOY..
descriptionHtml:
Here check it out for yourself http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GxR6r6mYPcY&feature=youtu.be

Kill it with fire is a mod which adds a new sword and armour to the game (glass sword and thalmor armour base) both super Over-powered. Soon to have less Over-powered files. The sword can be found in the corner in the Sleeping giant in Riverwood. The armour can be found under the bridge in Whiterun.  
...........................................................................................................................................

The movement of the sword is very fast and soon will be reduced in another version for less Over-powered gameplay.
In the OP version the damage of the sword is 40 and weighs 6 , the speed is 5 (which is very fast) and dose 30 points of fire damage.
The armour stats are, Boots of Bows  fortify\'s Archery by 40%, Gloves of Stamina adds 70 Stamina points and the Robes of Stealth fortify\'s Stealth by 40%.

...........................................................................................................................................


The new version is now out which changes all the components of the sword and armour, reducing its damage to 22 and the armour to fortify 25%.

...........................................................................................................................................

ENJOY..

INSTALL.
open file with a .rar file with winrar (or other such programs) and drag in to data folder in the skyrim folder.

UNINSTALL.
delete the files from your data folder.
author: Meatybanana
